attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am on a mission to build an indoor bike park like rays indoor bike park. but in england!
it will be built in watford/croxley

i need your petitions so that it shows that the site will not be a awaste of time and people will enjoy it.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.

Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
